participant_1.background:
I do my laundry on a weekly basis.
I used to wear tight clothes, but now I prefer more comfortable options.
i like to play outside.
My family is not very wealthy, but we do what we can to help those in need.
I'm trying to make up for my past mistakes by using my engineering skills to help make the world a better place.

participant_2.background:
I am a music student who is ready to start my day, but my car is acting up
my favorite band is bon over.
i write children s books.
I watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team.
I listen to music in my hearse before starting my day.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well! I am a bit nervous about my car, but otherwise good!
It's acting up and I don't know what's wrong with it!
Oh no! I hope it's nothing serious.
Me too! I'm supposed to go to a music lesson in a few minutes, so I hope I can get there!
Oh, I hope you make it! What kind of music do you play?
I play the piano! I love it, it's so much fun.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
You should! It's really fun and it's a great way to relax.
Yeah, I should! I'll have to look into lessons.
You should! It's a great way to meet new people too.
That's true! I've always wanted to meet new people.
Well, you should come to my music lesson with me! We can meet some of my friends and you can hear me play.
That would be great! What time is your lesson?
Great! I'm excited to meet you!
